title: New Item for Mana and MR
body:
I've noticed that there is no Mana and MR item there are however:

Mana and Armour - Frozen Heart
Health and Armour - Sunfires
Health and Magic Resist - Banshee's Veil
and even Health and Mana - Rod of Ages

maybe there should be a +200 base mana +25/50% mana regen ~~25/35~~ 15/20 MR item or 300 base mana and ~~25/35~~ 15/20 MR

Most mid laners would benifit from this and poeple like jayce, cho and most other mana heavy tanks
